name: The (Bottomless) Pits of d'Oh!
description:
You've been sucked into The (Bottomless) Pits of d'Oh!

Now try to escape, pathetic paddling!
Hint: You can't! This is an infinite breakanoid! Muahahahaha!

Slice the ball! 
That's how you change its angle (your paddle is flat)!

Choose your Path of Destruction!
Make regular progress through the Elevator Shaft!
Find your daily challenge in the Exhaust Pipes!
Explore the ever-changing Sewer Lines!

...

made with Pico-8
 music © partnersinrhyme.com
